Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils

Interface Summary
ActionHelper.ByElementExtractor Interface for implementations that extracts the by element from an entity.
CustomFieldsContainer<CF extends CustomField,CFV extends CustomFieldValue> Base class for classes (Entities, DTOs, etc) with custom fields
CustomObjectHandler Handler for custom objects creation, such as TransferListener, ISmsContext and so on
IExceptionHandler  
IntValuedEnum Enums with an associated int value
LinkGenerator This class can generate links for specific
MessageResolver Interface used for retrieving messages
MessageResourcesLoadedListener This listener interface is used to signal to an observer that the translation resource bundles have been loaded and thus translations are possible
StringValuedEnum Enums with an associated string value
Transactional<T> Callback interface for transactional code.
TransactionHelper Helper for transaction manipulation

Amount Represents a percentage or fixed value

CacheCleaner A helper class that invokes FetchService.clearCache() when needed
